Author: shark_robinson
Text: I'm sorry you're feeling so bad and that your dad passed. If you want to express yourself with writing or art you should go for it and try not to be so critical about how "good" it is! Having an outlet is often really helpful for processing difficult emotions, and you don't ever have to show anyone else if you don't want to. Is there anyone in your life who could help you make appointments/calls to deal with your medications? Sometimes having someone else make the first step on your behalf can really help break the inertia. You have so much time to achieve any of the goals you want in life and there is no expiration date on accomplishments!
